coded_answer.p: I am writing to reply forto your letter about the competition.
First of all I would like to say that I am very happy that I won first prize in your competition.

Secondly, you asked me, when I have time for travel, so I can go onlyonly go in July, because only in July I have holidayI only have holiday in July. And I would like to go in the first part of this month, the socondsecond part I spend with my famillyfamily.
If you do not mind I would prefer a tent, because in a tent I will be alongalone.

While I will be at the Camp I would like sailing, because it is my favoritefavourite sport. I am good at it - I amhave been sailing fromsince childhood. The second activitiesactivity which I would like to do is surfing - I have never dodone it.
I would like to know, how much money I must have with me? And what clothes I should take with me.
I am looking forward to hearing from you.
'This is such a marvellous book you will want to read it again'
In my opininionopinion this book 'The Old Man and the sea' is the best book which Ernest Hemingway had writenwrittenwrote.

Thise book is about a menman who knowknows that he will die soon, he knowknows that he didn't mademake his dream coomcome trutrue. So he decidetdecided to go for a last trip in his life. HesHis destenationdestinationgoal is getto get a Marlin. He is very old, and he isn't so strong thatas he should be. He needneeds to rest, but he don'tdoesn't gevegive up. IIn the end he makemakes his dremsdreams coomcome trutrue, he getgetscatches a vast Marlin.

In thisethis book Hemingway is trying to tell us, that if we want something, we can get it, it canmight be deficultdifficult and take a long time but we can do it. We must believe in our selfsourselves.
People in our ages should think about this. Sometimes they gevegive up, beforbefore they get something,
To sum up I must say that every-oneeveryone should read this book.
